snippet.title: A Day of Maintenance: Mood Trailer
snippet.description:
https://bighandinsky.itch.io/maintenance-day 

A Day of Maintenance is a mixture of a truck-sim, crane-operation puzzler, and queer sci-fi visual novel game. Set in the distant 2100s, you play a robot tasked with fixing up old decaying infrastructure, talking to your robot boyfriend who fixes satellites, and to your robot crew of workers as you drive across the open desert


If you've ever found yourself thinking:  

"I want a kind-of-technical driving game with a little gay romance but also some discussion over robot worker consciousness. (With crane operation gameplay)" 

This game is for you.


Demo Available on PC, Mac & Linux. Game will be released on April 22, 2022

Itch.io: https://bighandinsky.itch.io/maintenance-day 
Steam: https://bighandinsky.itch.io/maintenance-day
